body: So if the mom is not the real mother, damn the Mc should fucking take revenge and rape her to the ground! He deserves it! She makes an monster out of the glasses dudes, lucky enough to fuck a hot milf but ntr his friends! What an assholes!
Waow this shit still continue?

Nah, H9 fucked up with this story. The dad had no choice but to have the child with another woman since the wife was infertile, which makes it understandable that the wife hates him, but to take her anger out on the adopted child and have his entire life ruined by using Kenji to NTR him? Why? And the last 10 pages are literally copy pasted from chapter 1. Bitch is petty as fuck. Please end this misery. Just give me a few more good shota fuck scenes and call it a wrap.
curiosity killed the cat the cat was killed by curiosity curiosity shood goto jail dawg

This is what happens when you try too hard to make an NTR story even more despicable. Like just do the bare minimum and leave it at that. Not every mangaka has the chops to make an NTR story engaging. Hana Hook and MSTP Jin are a few names that can do it right, but this? This is just off the rails lol

Oh my gosh! It's one of the stupidest backgrounds I've ever read in an NTR. Basically the author is making a "terasu MC" making the MC suffer for free, just for existing. Now what is missing?, that the other parents do NTR?

I think the funniest thing about this 2 part backstory is that, despite being insanely dumb it connected the entire story in such a clean way its crazy. It really turned a regular ntr into a story about a cycle of hatred lol

I'm not gonna cap, this is fucking stupid but its also really funny. Like why force some random backstory like this? This nigga really said "hmm yes I'll have an infertile mother hate her non biological son so much that she pays a kid in his class in sex just to fuck with him for years, and I'll have him use all the techniques i taught him over the past decade to steal my "sons" first love so he'll feel my pain". Like what the fuck lmao
i never thought that netorare story will become more dumb every year
This is the dumbest plot I have read. Oh well, atleast it's hot.
it seems that the mc is not her son, but the son of his father's lover, she doesn't like him very much
When you think a NTR can't get more stupid
Err… so it was the mother’s “somewhat” fault? Why? Why is it necessary to add weird lore like this?
I remember a plot where the girlfriend is blackmailed because the ntrguy took a photo of the boyfriend SLEEPING not drunk just SLEEPING, I guess ntr authors are just tired xD
this still going on?

Apparently he's not her son the dad had him with another woman because of infertility problems. they have a daughter later but it's probably kenjis kid if i'm reading it right. but yeah fuck that woman hope the dad figures it out but ima guess she faked the dna results and the kids are kenjis like I said early on. Either way why the fuck did he stay friends with that douchebag she should have stayed far away from him after tripping him pantsing him and scaring him should have been obvious he was a dick to him on purpose.
We are about to hit the stagnation point. Bruh why do these niggers always drop the ball, it's like the isekai genre, that's how comically bad NTR is these days.

Seriously!!!!
Mother Intentionally letting and helping own son get bullied by the asshole just because she is jealous of her own son that the father loves the son more than the wife.
Another story was from Etuzan Jakusai when the wife cheated because her husband loves their daughter more.
Wife committing cheating just because their husband love their own children.
These Damn NTR authors are running out of plot these days.
